div.pre: 2162 Milocca, near Caltanissetta, c. 1930? (696) Burial: late 4th cent. B.C. (K) Contents: 137 AE. Pot hoard with aes rude and worked bronze Acragas: 117 Himera: 1 Syracuse: 19 (Athena/dolphins [12]; Athe- na/hippocamp [7]) Disposition: Syracuse 125 † Orsi, AttiMemIIN 1932, pp. 38-46, illus. Currò Pisanò, AIIN 1962-4, pp. 231, 238 Orsi locates at Palermo, but currently the hd. is at Syracuse (Currò, AIIN 1962-4)
